    • UrlToJsonNode

      public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode UrlToJsonNode​(java.lang.String inputURL)
      method for extracting a JsonNode from an input url, handling various errors
      Parameters:
      inputURL - the URL from which to extract the JsonNode
      Returns:
      the extracted JsonNode
      Throws:
      ServerException - if the input url is malformed
      ServerException - if there is an error in the json parsing
      ServerException - if there is a connection error
      See Also:
      JsonNode

    • JsonNodeToArrayList

      public static <T> java.util.ArrayList<T> JsonNodeToArrayList​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode inputNode, java.lang.Class<T> model)
      method that extract an arraylist of a model class from a JsonNode, handling parsing errors
      Parameters:
      inputNode - the node from which to extract the array
      model - the model class
      Returns:
      the array oof model class extracted from the JsonNode
      See Also:
      JsonNode

    • RawInputToWordSelection

      public static WordSelection RawInputToWordSelection​(java.lang.String rawInput)
      method that extract a WordSelection object from a json formatted string input
      Parameters:
      rawInput - json formatted string to be converted to WordSelection object
      Returns:
      WordSelection containing the data in the input string
      Throws:
      UserException - if the input string is not correctly formatted
      See Also:
      WordSelection
